GREAT EAST SIDE LOCATION CLOSE TO BEACH, BUS LINES, SEAPORT DISTRICT, THOMAS PARK, AND ALL THE HOTTEST BROADWAY SHOPS, BARS AND RESTAURANTS. PETS NEGOTIABLE. AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 1ST, TENANT TO PAY ONE MONTH BROKERAGE FEE.
